text:
Department of Speech
Oct. 10, 1956
Elmira College
Elmira, New York
Dr. Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
National. Assoc, of Educational Broadcasters
l4 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Ill.
Dear Dr. Skornia:
Elmira College is seriously considering
establishing a 10-watt educational FM radio
station on its campus. Before we undertake to
plan details of programming, however, we would
like to inquire about the procedure for becoming
a member of the National Association of
Educational Broadcasters.
Would you supply us with this informatioi
and any materials relating to the use of NAEB
tapes and transcriptions?
Asst. Prof, of Speech
